TFT_Portals_Default_NoPortal.name: No encounter.
TFT_Portals_Default_NoPortal.shortDescription: There is no encounter this game.

TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticFirst.name: Prismatic Prelude
TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticFirst.shortDescription: The first augment offered this game will be prismatic tier.

TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticThird.name: Prismatic Finale
TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticThird.shortDescription: The last augment offered this game will be prismatic tier.

TFT_Portals_Augments_TriplePrismatic.name: Prismatic Party
TFT_Portals_Augments_TriplePrismatic.shortDescription: All augments offered this game will be prismatic tier.

TFT_Portals_Augments_GoldFirst.name: Golden Prelude
TFT_Portals_Augments_GoldFirst.shortDescription: The first augment offered this game will be gold tier.

TFT_Portals_Augments_TripleGold.name: Golden Gala
TFT_Portals_Augments_TripleGold.shortDescription: Vander serves up three gold augments this game.

TFT_Portals_Gold_GoldSubscription.name: Gold Subscription
TFT_Portals_Gold_GoldSubscription.shortDescription: Every stage, gain a random amount of gold. All players gain the same amount.

TFT_Portals_Unique_LootSubscription.name: Loot Subscription
TFT_Portals_Unique_LootSubscription.shortDescription: Every stage, gain random loot from a highly varied pool.

TFT_Portals_Items_RadiantItem.name: Radiant Item
TFT_Portals_Items_RadiantItem.shortDescription: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items later in the game (very powerful versions of completed items).

TFT_Portals_Items_ArtifactAnvil.name: Artifact Anvil
TFT_Portals_Items_ArtifactAnvil.shortDescription: Start with 1 Artifact anvil (choose a powerful item).

TFT_Portals_Unique_WanderingTrainers.name: Trainer Golems
TFT_Portals_Unique_WanderingTrainers.shortDescription: Start with a Golem with 3 permanently attached emblems.

TFT_Portals_Unique_CrabRave.name: Crab Rave
TFT_Portals_Unique_CrabRave.shortDescription: Jinx steals all the monsters and replaces them with crabs that drop bonus loot, but crabs on Stage 5+ are SUPER DEADLY.

TFT_Portals_Unique_ScuttlePuddle.name: Scuttle Puddle
TFT_Portals_Unique_ScuttlePuddle.shortDescription: Jinx steals all the monsters and replaces them with crabs that drop bonus loot.

TFT_Portals_Chosen_Farsight.name: Farsight
TFT_Portals_Chosen_Farsight.shortDescription: Chosen champions appear in your shop as if you were one level higher.

TFT_Portals_Chosen_Omnipotence.name: Omnipotence
TFT_Portals_Chosen_Omnipotence.shortDescription: Chosen champions grant plus-one to another one of their traits.

TFT_Portals_Unique_LuckyLanterns.name: Lucky Lanterns
TFT_Portals_Unique_LuckyLanterns.shortDescription: Lucky Lanterns containing loot will appear in stage 2 to 4 after carousel.

TFT_Portals_Champions_DuplicatorStart.name: Champion Duplicator
TFT_Portals_Champions_DuplicatorStart.shortDescription: Start the game with a Champion Duplicator.

TFT_Portals_Gold_Cashout.name: Pot of Gold
TFT_Portals_Gold_Cashout.shortDescription: At stage 6-1, all living players split a pot of 250 gold.

TFT_Portals_Augments_GoldThird.name: Golden Finale
TFT_Portals_Augments_GoldThird.shortDescription: The last augment offered this game will be gold tier.

TFT_Portals_Augments_SilverGoldPrismatic.name: Ascending Augments
TFT_Portals_Augments_SilverGoldPrismatic.shortDescription: Augments this game will be silver, gold, then prismatic tier.

TFT_Portals_Items_TacticiansCrown.name: Tactician's Crown
TFT_Portals_Items_TacticiansCrown.shortDescription: Start with a Tactician's Crown (gain +1 team size).

TFT_Portals_Unique_RadiantBlessing.name: Mel's Blessing
TFT_Portals_Unique_RadiantBlessing.shortDescription: Mel will grant you powerful loot at 40 player health.

TFT_Portals_Gold_GoldPerItem.name: Item Payout
TFT_Portals_Gold_GoldPerItem.shortDescription: When you build items, gain gold.

TFT_Portals_Champions_RandomChampion.name: Champion Delivery
TFT_Portals_Champions_RandomChampion.shortDescription: Twice per stage, gain a high cost champion. The value goes up with game time.

TFT_Portals_Unique_DoubleItemCarousel.name: Loaded Carousels
TFT_Portals_Unique_DoubleItemCarousel.shortDescription: Component carousels have an extra component on each champion.

TFT_Portals_Items_ComponentFeast.name: Anvil Buffet
TFT_Portals_Items_ComponentFeast.shortDescription: All items drop as component anvils.

TFT_Portals_Champions_TailoredChampion.name: Champion Conference
TFT_Portals_Champions_TailoredChampion.shortDescription: Every stage, gain a champion that fits your team.

TFT_Portals_Unique_LootSentinels.name: Treasure Golems
TFT_Portals_Unique_LootSentinels.shortDescription: Start with a Golem permanently equipped with an Unstable Treasure Chest. Later in the game, the Golem equips a second one.

TFT_Portals_Unique_TreasureArmory.name: Treasure Armory
TFT_Portals_Unique_TreasureArmory.shortDescription: On stage 4-7, choose a 5-piece package of powerful loot.

TFT_Portals_Unique_PowderMonkey.name: Wind-up Monkey
TFT_Portals_Unique_PowderMonkey.shortDescription: Powder has released a wind-up monkey. Something will happen on 3-5!

TFT_Portals_Unique_PowderMonkey_Result1.name: Wind-up Monkey
TFT_Portals_Unique_PowderMonkey_Result1.shortDescription: Uh oh! That explosion was much bigger than planned! Everyone takes 10 damage.

TFT_Portals_Unique_PowderMonkey_Result2.name: Wind-up Monkey
TFT_Portals_Unique_PowderMonkey_Result2.shortDescription: This monkey has some valuable pieces! Everyone gains 25 gold.

TFT_Portals_Unique_PowderMonkey_Result3.name: Wind-up Monkey
TFT_Portals_Unique_PowderMonkey_Result3.shortDescription: Looks like the hextech crystal is salvageable - you can use it to upgrade an item!

TFT_Portals_Unique_PowderMonkey_Result4.name: Wind-up Monkey
TFT_Portals_Unique_PowderMonkey_Result4.shortDescription: The monkey didn't explode, but it can be turned into quite a bit of scrap.

TFT_Portals_Items_LetEmCook.name: Make 'Em Cook
TFT_Portals_Items_LetEmCook.shortDescription: Start with a Spatula and a Frying Pan. Reforgers wont drop.

TFT_Portals_Unique_SixCosts.name: Viktor's Vision
TFT_Portals_Unique_SixCosts.shortDescription: Viktor makes 6 costs appear starting on stage 4-1 and makes them 3 times as likely to appear in your shop.

TFT_Portals_Unique_SixCosts_HR.name: Viktor's Vision
TFT_Portals_Unique_SixCosts_HR.shortDescription: Viktor makes 6 costs appear starting on stage 7-1 and makes them 3 times as likely to appear in your shop.

TFT_Portals_Unique_ExtraAnomaly.name: Viktor's Vision
TFT_Portals_Unique_ExtraAnomaly.shortDescription: Viktor grants you the ability to use the Anomaly twice this game, at 3-6 and 4-6.

TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage1_Option1.name: 1 - Science!
TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage1_Option1.shortDescription: Harness the power of the Anomaly

TFT_Portals_Unique_ExtraAnomaly_HR.name: Viktor's Vision
TFT_Portals_Unique_ExtraAnomaly_HR.shortDescription: Viktor grants you the ability to use the Anomaly twice this game, at 6-2 and 8-2.

TFT_Portals_Items_SupportAnvils.name: Mel's Aid
TFT_Portals_Items_SupportAnvils.shortDescription: Mel will grant you powerful loot at 40 player health.

TFT_Portals_Items_SupportAnvils_HR.name: Mel's Aid
TFT_Portals_Items_SupportAnvils_HR.shortDescription: Mel will grant you powerful loot at 10 player health.

TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage2_Option1.name: OK
TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage2_Option1.shortDescription: Fill the next shop with Rammus

TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage2_Option2.name: Workout Session
TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage2_Option2.shortDescription: Working out with Sett makes you BIGGER

TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage3_Option2.name: 2 - Advancement
TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage3_Option2.shortDescription: Half of all items become Radiant

TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage3_Option3.name: 3 - Declare War
TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage3_Option3.shortDescription: Round timers are cut in half. Player damage is increased.

TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage6_Option1.shortDescription: The first augment offered this game will be gold tier.

TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage6_Option2.shortDescription: The first augment offered this game will be gold tier.

TFT_Portals_Macao_Stage6_Option3.shortDescription: The first augment offered this game will be gold tier.

TFT_Portals_Unique_WarwickHunt.name: Warwick's Hunger
TFT_Portals_Unique_WarwickHunt.shortDescription: When you kill an enemy champion, Warwick will occasionally devour their body and leave loot behind.
